meanings.definition: A person or thing that protects or defends.
meanings.sent1: The brave protecters shielded the village from harm.
meanings.sent2: The protecters of the forest ensured the animals were safe.
meanings.sent3: The protecters of the castle had a tough job keeping intruders out.
meanings.sent4: The protecters stood like a wall against any danger.
meanings.sent5: The protecters were like guardians, watching over the land day and night.

meanings.definition: A device or mechanism designed to protect.
meanings.sent1: The security cameras were the protecters of the building.
meanings.sent2: The password is the protecters of your personal information.
meanings.sent3: The alarm system acted as the protecters of the house, scaring away burglars.
meanings.sent4: The lock on the door was the protecters against unauthorized entry.
meanings.sent5: The protecters, like a shield, kept the valuable items safe from harm.

meanings.definition: The act of protecting or defending.
meanings.sent1: The protecters of the weak always stood up against bullies.
meanings.sent2: Her quick thinking was the protecters of her from getting into trouble.
meanings.sent3: The protecters of the peace ensured that conflicts were resolved peacefully.
meanings.sent4: The protecters of justice fought for what was right in the world.
meanings.sent5: The protecters of the environment worked tirelessly to keep nature safe.
